feed.title: Beck Lab
feed.subtitle: Our lab uses tadpoles of the clawed frog _Xenopus laevis_ to study development and regeneration of appendages and to understand how mutations in over 100 genes lead to developmental and epilieptic encephalopathy (DEE) in humans.
